Player History
Drafted in 5th round, 106th overall pick, by Toledo in 1968...
Injured on 5/30/1974 with a Pulled Groin Muscle, out for 4 weeks...
Injured on 8/22/1974 with a Tender Shoulder, out for 1-2 weeks...
Had first career hit on 4/15/1977, off Aaron Zayas (PG)...
Hit first career homerun on 6/13/1977, off Harry Taylor (CBC)...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against Northeastern on 7/18/1980...

Signed as a free agent by New Jersey on 3/1/1987 to a minor league contract.
Released by New Jersey on 4/7/1987...
